We've made it easier to check if you have push notifications enabled, so you never miss out on any new and important notifications about your progress on Fabulous.

Thank you for using Fabulous!

We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available Fabulous features.

**A New Journey Has Arrived**

We've launched a new 30 day Life Well Balanced journey with the goal to break your tech addiction and help you build a healthy relationship with your device. Take the new journey and start living more mindfully today!

Thanks for using the Fabulous! We're always updating the app to enrich the experience for the community. As new features become available, we'll highlight in the app.

We have 2 new super powers to help you achieve your goals and sustain habit change.

Questions and Affirmations
Questions are important in helping you achieve your goals. Asking the right question can help shape your mind and change your behavior

Close your eyes and picture the full moon rising above the mountains on your fabulous path. As the stars come out one by one, let go of the day.
Release the tension that your muscles have been carrying. Breath deeply and give in to relaxation.
